content.description: Let R be the region enclosed by the graphs of y = ln(x2 + 1) and y = cosx .
content.question: The base of a solid is the region R. Each cross section of the solid perpendicular to the x-axis is an equilateral triangle. Write an expression involving one or more integrals that gives the volume of the solid. Do not evaluate.

frqParts.text: The base of a solid is the region R. Each cross section of the solid perpendicular to the x-axis is an equilateral triangle. Write an expression involving one or more integrals that gives the volume of the solid. Do not evaluate.

topic.text: 8.8: Volumes with Cross Sections - Triangles and Semicircles

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
